Text: Me̩ je̩nyu Jihofa,
ame̩ ku me̩ dago ef unyi Jihofa,
Me̩ je̩nyu Jihofa, todu Jihofa chenyo̩;
Todu Jihofa fu Jeko̩b chi ñw o̩la-wñ,
Todu u chema ka ki Jihofa chʼe̩ne̩ lile,
E̩wñ du ki nyo̩ Jihofa eju, i che,
Owñ aje̩ ñw atula kwane̩ ukpoj i ane̩-ile̩,
Kʼi fʼamo̩mo̩gba Ijipti gwoda le̩,
kʼi la fʼujiwe kpai uno̩
kʼi kʼabo uche̩ichi ki nana gwoda,
Siho̩n onu abo Amo̩r,
kʼi la mʼane̩-ma ko chʼe̩wñ ogu,
Odu-we̩, O Jihofa, chʼogbegbele̩,
Todu Jihofa adale ñw abo-wñ,
Ode abo uche̩ichi chʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia,
I nʼalu, i muda ko̩la n,
i che̩nʼeti, i muda gbo̩la n,
Abo du ku ma chʼo̩na-wñ adab owñ;
O abo unyi Israe̩l, me̩ ki kele Jihofa!
O abo unyi Lifai, me̩ ki kele Jihofa!
Jihofa ki nele kwefu Zayo̩n,
